page.title: 12A TYPICAL CHILD'S SUNDAY
page.content: On Sunday, I woke up at about 8.30 & sit up & read a book. At 9 o'clock I went to have a bath, get dressed & have my breakfast. I had Co-Co Pops & toast. After breakfast I cycled down to the garage (with my mum & dad), where our car is kept, & I helped to clean it. For dinner we had chicken, boiled potatoes, peas, carrots then apricot tart. After dinner, I went out to play with Tracey & we looked for ladybirds. At 3 o'clock we went to St.Peter's Church Flower Festival. For my tea I had sandwiches, crisps, biscuits & cakes. After tea, I played with my dolls & my tea set & then I had some supper. I brushed my hair & put it up in a "pony-tail", cleaned my teeth & went to bed.
